headline.main: EUROPE.; Diplomatic Correspondence. THE NEAPOLITAN DIFFICULTY.

docs.lead_paragraph: The following is the Diplomatic Correspondence in relation to the Neapolitan difficulties. We published yesterday the concluding part of Count WALESWSKI'S final instructions to the French Ambassador. No. 1.--Count Walewaki to Baron Brenier. PARIS, Wednesday, May 21, 1856.
